title: Womens Dress
title_original: PAVILIA Premium Womens Plush Soft Robe Fluffy, Warm, Fleece Sherpa Shaggy Bathrobe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality!
items.body: I love this robe. It is very soft, warm, and comfortable and the sleeves are not tight. It has pockets in the front and the length hits me mid calf. I’m 5’ 4” 135 lbs. It doesn’t shed and the color is beautiful. I’m so happy with this purchase. It also arrived promptly. Read more
items.author: MaryAnn Gullihur

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Christmas present
items.body: Very soft. Very comfy, wife uses every day. One of the best Christmas presents ever. I got pink and it looks exactly like the photos. Fitted well and it was just the right length. The hood is a nice feature but my wife doesn’t use it all that often. The pockets are a plus and are big in the front. We wash it in the washer and it the fabric had held up well. Read more
items.author: Braden F

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Soft and Cuddly
items.body: I love this robe. It is so soft and cuddly. I like that it’s lightweight but warm at the same time. It doesn’t shed when washed and it fits great. I’m very happy that I bought it. It is actually the nicest robe I’ve ever had. I highly recommend it. Read more
items.author: Carole

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Meets my expectations
items.body: Robe is very soft and washed well. Also it is not too heavy as some winter robes can but is very cozy and comfortable. 5he big deep pockets are appreciated. The size Lg/XL is a perfect fit for my 5'9" and 160lbs Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fluffy and warm, I love it!!
items.body: I'll be honest, for the price I expected to be disappointed in this robe. But as it turned out it is SOOO nice! It came sealed in a vacuum-sealed package so it wasn't very fluffy at first, but one wash as directed on the label later and I was in love! Silky soft, fluffy "fur" inside and out, true to color (I chose the light gray), and it didn't shrink at all. There was very little lint in the lint filter also, which was a big surprise. It seems to be lightweight and comfortably warm; I can't wait to climb into my PJs tonight and try it out then LOL I am 5'4, 140 lbs., and chose the L/XL which fit perfectly. Even the sleeves fit, which was a huge relief because most long-sleeved items fall about an inch or more short of my wrists. I included pictures of before and after washing to show how fluffy this thing is!!! Please forgive the warped mirror, I just moved in and have yet to hang it properly. Read more
items.author: TAO

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm Fluffy
items.body: The robe is fluffy and comfortable. I have a red wine color that is beautiful. It was inexpensive and is a great value for the money. I also love the deep pockets. Read more
items.author: Nancy S

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm and Cozy Robe
items.body: This robe is so soft and warm! I love that it has pockets, too. The size and length are as expected. Read more
items.author: June S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lush for the cost. Good value.
items.body: Excellent robe. Very lush and warm. Especially for the cost. Read more
items.author: John Caffera

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Gray, Blue, Black, Teal Blue, Light Blue, Taupe, Lavender, White, Purple, Heather Gray, Light Gray, Light Pink, Emerald Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
